评论概述: We bought it for My Granddaughter‘s second birthday.
评论详情: The quality of the dress was pretty nice for the price you cannot beat. It came in on time. The dress was so cute. I liked it. It was a little puffy, which was adorable. if you have a chunky baby like we do I suggest you go up a few sizes.
Dress seems to be a beautiful dress but it arrived with horrible stains as pictured and I needed it for my daughters birthday party, a replacement would not arrive in time. Very disappointed
I did buy it a little to big but granddaughter still wears it, she liked it that much.
Its super cute and fits true to size.
Bought for my niece who wants to wear only pink.  She insisted on putting this one on Christmas Eve

This adorable long-sleeve sequin tulle dress is perfect for toddler girls who love to feel like a princess. Designed with sparkling sequins and a layered tutu skirt, it’s ideal for formal events, birthday parties, and special occasions. Made with soft, comfortable materials, it ensures a gentle fit for little ones while keeping them stylish. Available in sizes 2-6, this dress combines elegance and playfulness, making it a must-have for any young girl’s wardrobe.
No complaints other than you can't tell the color of the sparkles. Size guide is accurate.  Good price. My 2 year old seems comfortable.

I ordered the pink color. The color is accurately depicted in the listing photos.  I ordered my daughter's regular size and found this to fit as expected. The fabric is soft and stretchy. It is a bit on the thin side but it's not sheer. The tule is fluffy.  I wash this in a washing machine separately and inside of a delicates bag to prevent the tile from snagging on anything. I hang it to dry.  Nice!
The quality is not good
My daughter likes it
It was cute just wish it was a was white it’s more of a cream color
Looks just like the photo and washed and dried (on delicate) very well! Love the material of the top ribbed section

This dress is super cute for little girls. It's comfortable, as the tulle doesn't touch the skin, so no scratching! The skirt has two layers of tulle, so it's decently full, and the sparkles are cute without being gaudy. It fits true to size and washes up well. I like how the dress can be both dressed up as more dressy or worn more casual. Great options that will satisfy a playful girl!

We ordered this dress for my 5 year old for her Halloween costume as a witch. It’s great because it can also be used as a regular dress. The size is great. She says it’s comfortable and not itchy. The color and sparkles on it are perfect.
This is the cutest dang dress EVER!  My niece who is 5 LOVES it. It’s so soft and so fluffy. The color is gorgeous and so much fun. The size is spot on and it’s very well made!

This is such a darling dress!  I absolutely love the daisy print details - they really make the dress.  I got the purple, and it is a lovely soft lilac that compliments the white and yellow daisy colors so well.  Fits great too!
The tulle is soft, which my daughter and I both love! Material is high quality and washes well! I would definitely recommend using a delicate bag though just to be safe!
This is very nicely made and true to size. Comfortable, precious enough for a special occasion, but practical enough for everyday princess wear.

评论概述: Fun and Bright Dress for Parties
评论详情: The girl's dress is soft and the dress fits my granddaughter well. The bright deep pink is eye-catching and the tulle is dreamy. The good quality dress is great for parties and playing dress up.

This dress is so beatiful. I love it and so does my daughter. Get it you won't regret it. The dress is cotton but not tchick and cover with another fabric. The sleeve are really cute. i won't wash this dress with washer machine. it is better by hand. i bouught the blue 4-5 years and my daughter is 3.

This dress is stunning. It glistens and looks amazing! Can't wait for her to wear it for Christmas! She has been wearing it around the house. It apparently is comfortable.  Fits as expected. The color is vibrant!

My picture and video really don’t do this dress justice, it is so much closer to the listing’s picture than mine. Very full tulle sleeves and skirt, and nice quality material. The navy blue is elegant and true to color. I ordered a 4-5 for my little one and it definitely leans closer to the 5, but I’m okay with that, just means she’ll get to wear it longer. The material is soft, stretchy and light, not a dress that’s going to keep a little one warm. The tulle on the sleeves sets this dress apart and gives it a unique look. Would recommend!

Our daughter loves it. Great for fall when it’s Not to hot and not to cold. The dress is soft and our toddler said it isn’t itchy! Very bright pink in color! Both the toddler and I recommend this dress!

This dress does look like a little princess' tutu.  The "tutu" part is more subtle.  Tutu-inspired dress may be a more accurate discription.The cut is good.  The fabric is pretty decent.  It's a good value gift.
I order this dress for my daughter she really like it fits her perfectly very good material

This dress is high quality, with soft, comfortable material. The tulle is even soft, which makes it flow nicely and makes it more comfortable for my toddler. My daughter just turned 2 and is just about to outgrow her 2T clothes - the size 2-3 fit her okay, but was a little baggy, so I'd say it is true to size. The color looks just like the listing picture. I washed it in cold water with other laundry and hung to dry - it looked fine with no ironing or steaming (good thing, since I won't do that for kids clothes!). I would recommend this one.

Our little one is allllllll about the pretty dresses and tule. This was a great compromise between a dressy dress yet still neutral enough for the parent palate. It'll be perfect for the holidays or special occasions. I like the sleeves underneath and the tule accent over so that it's not too itchy. The size is a bit bigger than the standard size 5-6. Not too much twirling though in this dress, but cute on!

I bought the Arshiner Toddler Girls Long Sleeve Sequin Tulle Dress in size 3-4 for my daughter, who will be 4 in January, and it fits just perfectly! I absolutely love how full the tulle skirt is—it’s so glittery and flowy! The color is exactly like the photos show, making it perfect for Christmas. My daughter feels like a princess in it, and she adores the dress. It’s a fantastic choice for any special occasion or party! Highly recommend!
This dress is so cute! It fits true to size and the tutu and sleeves are very sparkly. The black knit-type material is very soft and stretchy.
Got this for our tall 3yo granddaughter - it's a bit big, but should fit well by springtime!  It seems well made, and she isn't complaining about the material scratching her.

This tulle dress is so pretty! The fabric feels soft and stretchy and the Tulle adds the perfect amount of flare for every ballerina! The sparkle accents really just complete the dress and make it pop! It makes such a beautiful Christmas season dress! My daughter loves it.
Well made, has a nice underlining

The Arshiner Toddler Girls Long Sleeve Sequin Tulle Dress is a charming formal dress perfect for parties and special occasions. In a pink daisy tulle design, it features long sleeves and a sparkling sequin bodice, adding a touch of elegance and fun. Available in sizes 2-6, it’s designed to make toddlers feel like little princesses. The tutu skirt adds a playful flair, while the soft fabric ensures comfort. Overall, it’s a beautiful and festive choice for any young girl’s wardrobe.
Kiddo loves it, it fits really well and made with good material. Looks exactly like the picture.

This dress is soft and comfortable, the inner lining preventing any scratchiness from the tulle. It looks great, the daisies giving a lovely spring feel. The glitter has not come off at all after 3 washings.

This dress is very well made and for the most part looks like the picture. I thought for some reason that it would be a bit more dressy but it's a pretty, simple dress. The tulle is what kinda of dresses it up but I wouldn't take professional pics or anything like that in it. But this would still work for a nice little event where your kid isn't the main attraction. The size seems to be accurate, though it is a little big on my 5 year old.
This is a pretty dress. The color is bright light blue. The daisy flowers on the skirt are pretty. Overall a good value for money

So the 5-6 is actually size 6, and it fits perfectly on my 48" 50 lb daughter. The dress arrived very compressed, but the tulle looks beautiful once I fluffed it all back up into shape. The material that touches the skin is very soft and stretchy, and it prevents feeling any scratchiness from the tulle. The glitter has not come off at all from my daughter trying this on and twirling around the room for the last half hour. This dress looks very fancy, while still feeling comfortable, which is a must for my little girl and most kids. Comfy clothes get a lot more wear since they can be for every day and not reserved for special occasions.

评论概述: Very nice dress, soft and comfortable with lots of fullness
评论详情: I am really impressed with this dress for the price. It is really lovely and unlike many dresses that have a tulle overlay, this one really is as full and pretty as the picture shows it to be. It comes in lots of pretty color choices, both solid colored and with pretty little daisies on the tulle. The knit under dress is a nice weight and really well sewn. It is soft, stretchy and comfortable. The daisies give this such a pretty look and my daughter (who tends to be sensitive to scratchy material) loves the sleeves (which are overlaid with tulle to match the skirt of the dress but have the knit inside them, keeping the dress both soft and warm)  This does run very large so you may want to consider sizing down. My daughter typically wears a 4/5 and that is what we ordered but this dress is really large on her- more of a 6/6X and she will need to grow into it.  This dress is really lovely and full, well constructed and soft at a really reasonable price point. We will be ordering this in other colors to wear this winter. It is beautiful enough for special occasions but comfortable enough to be worn to school if you have a child who really likes a dressy look.
This dress looks so pretty on my daughter. It also fits perfectly!
Toddler dress is very comfortable materials. Nice and light sizing is right very pretty dress.

Fits to size and looks so adorable on! My little active lady got tons of shout outs for how great she made the dress look! Just enough sparkle and shimmer to be fancy and stretching and soft to be comfortable!
Got sent a used product!! GROSS
